description: {"blocks":[{"key":"8htmb","text":"This protocol describes the isolation of high-quality total RNA from frozen placenta tissue. Tissue is disrupted using a bead beater, and total RNA is isolated using the mirVana miRNA Isolation Kit from Ambion. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":170,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9sq3q","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bmr6n","text":"Written steps are adapted from Ambion's manual for the mirVana miRNA Isolation Kit and BioSpec's instructions for the Mini-BeadBeater-16.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":55,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}},"3":{"type":"safety","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"31s6m","text":"Samples should be in screw-cap microcentrifuge tubes with integral O-rings in the caps. Snap-cap tubes should not be used, unless secured with an adapter.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"aul93","text":"Load samples immediately into Mini-BeadBeater-16 vial holder ring. Up to 16 samples can be accommodated.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1082b","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dc70u","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"safety","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"3ivh5","text":"IMPORTANT: Rotate the vial holder ring to a position where the small hole in the vial holder ring engages the anti-rotation pin sticking out of the wiggle mechanism. Slide the vial holder down the pin and seat it flat on the wiggle mechanism. Slide the large, black plastic hold-down cap over the stainless steel center bolt, aligning it so that it too slides down the anti-rotation pin. The hold-down cap must make contact with the top of the aluminum wiggle mechanism - not just the tops of the microcentrifuge tubes. Finally, screw on and hand-tighten the black knob firmly. Repeat: Tighten firmly.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

Discard contaminated pipette tips in appropriate waste container.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cq9gk","text":"Carefully remove   of the top aqueous phase and transfer to a fresh labeled microcentrifuge tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":17,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8ee8b","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2oogg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d7i40","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6gdag","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ehqlq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"350","error":false,"guid":"5EADA7807FE511EC8772F78B7D786631","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"ah9kt","text":"It is possible to remove a greater volume to maximize RNA yield, but make sure not to disturb the interphase or organic phase.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}},"2":{"type":"safety","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"eqbr6","text":"Discard phenol liquid waste and contaminated tubes in appropriate waste containers.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bldch","text":"Add   (1.25 volumes) 200 proof pure ethanol and mix thoroughly. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"32qnv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3ncj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"437.5","error":false,"guid":"DB55B4507FE811EC8772F78B7D786631","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"76jg3","text":"Add   mirVana Wash Solution 1 and spin   in pre-chilled microcentrifuge. Discard flow-through.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":6,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":39,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9n058","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9n8f","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"v0bm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"700","error":false,"guid":"612A7EA07FF611EC8772F78B7D786631","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"","data":{"centrifuge":"10000","duration":15,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"777A51307FF611EC8772F78B7D786631","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"4","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}},"2":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"87mci","text":"Tip: flow-through can be aspirated into an appropriately-labeled waste container using a vacuum.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1pm2t","text":"Add   mirVana Wash Solution 2/3 and spin   in pre-chilled microcentrifuge. Discard flow-through. Repeat wash step.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":6,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":41,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"500","error":false,"guid":"05834A8F7FF711EC859B0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"700","centrifuge":"10000","duration":15,"error":false,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"05834BF07FF711EC859B0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"4","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1v7cr","text":"After discarding flow-through from the last step, spin   in pre-chilled microcentrifuge to remove residual Wash Solution.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":55,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9bpue","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"","data":{"centrifuge":"10000","duration":120,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"AA694C807FF711EC8772F78B7D786631","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"4","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bd6jc","text":"Transfer mirVana Filter Cartridge into a fresh mirVana Collection Tube. Add   pre-heated nuclease-free water to the center of the filter and close the cap. Incubate   and then spin   in pre-chilled centrifuge to elute RNA.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":9,"length":3},{"style":"italic","offset":47,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":76,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":165,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":181,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bnn0e","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"40","error":false,"guid":"40981B507FF811EC8772F78B7D786631","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":60,"guid":"834692607FF811EC8772F78B7D786631","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":30,"guid":"E96945107FF811EC8772F78B7D786631","id":0,"label":"maximum speed","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d57pu","text":"Transfer eluate from the mirVana Collection Tube to a low bind microcentrifuge tube and store at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":25,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":97,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7413k","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8u5j0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b3taq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"5A0B31707FF911EC8772F78B7D786631","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-80","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"6ebb9","text":"Minimize freeze/thaw cycles.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"9tb0b","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"3re3u","text":"Tip: Store a small aliquot in a separate tube for QC.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bkv2j","text":"Quantitate RNA using NanoDrop. Pay attention to A260/A280 ratio. For highly pure RNA, a ratio of 1.8-2.1 is expected. If necessary, repurify by adding 1/10th nuclease-free 5M NaCl and 1.38 volumes 200 proof pure ethanol before repassing the sample over a fresh mirVana Filter Cartridge. Continue the total RNA isolation from Step 17.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":261,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dnk60","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8hbmr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1js7k","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"diiac","text":"RNA can also be quantitated using Qubit RNA Broad Range Assay.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b8qan","text":"Transfer up to   lysate/ethanol mixture to mirVana Filter Cartridge (placed into mirVana Collection Tube) and spin   in pre-chilled microcentrifuge. Discard flow-through. Repeat with remaining volume of lysate/ethanol mixture.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":43,"length":3},{"style":"italic","offset":81,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":15,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":115,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7sdg4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bct7r","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dm38b","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7ek67","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"700","error":false,"guid":"9A0077A77FFC11EC859B0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"700","centrifuge":"10000","duration":15,"error":false,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"9A0078BF7FFC11EC859B0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"4","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}},"2":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"length":1,"offset":48},{"key":1,"length":1,"offset":135}],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":3,"offset":0,"style":"italic"}],"key":"8rvp1","text":"mirVana Filter Cartridges can accommodate up to   volume - do not overfill. {"blocks":[{"key":"b91qi","text":"Assess RNA quality by running the RNA 6000 Nano Assay on an Agilent 2100 Bioanalyzer. A RIN score of \u003e7.0 is normal for total RNA isolated from placenta.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
